desc: Elevate your planning with effortlessly combining the benefits of planning on paper and digital planning. Enables you to convert notes, checklists and daily plans to its digital equivalent. Connecting to the app gives you the flexibility to manage and organize your essential planning structures digitally.

layout.text:
Planner and app
Handwritten to digital
text in an instant.

Elevate your planning with effortlessly combining
the benefits of planning on paper and digital planning.
The 1st planner that enables you to convert notes,
checklists and daily plans to its digital equivalent.
Connecting to the app gives you the flexibility
to manage and organize your essential planning
structures digitally.
